definitions.text: the chest considered as the place where secret thoughts are kept
examples: his bosom was bursting with the secret

definitions.text: cloth that covers the chest or breasts
a close affectionate and protective acceptance
examples: his willing embrace of new ideas
in the bosom of the family

definitions.text: the locus of feelings and intuitions
examples: in your heart you know it is true
her story would melt your bosom

definitions.text: either of two soft fleshy milk-secreting glandular organs on the chest of a woman
squeeze (someone) tightly in your arms, usually with fondness
examples: He hugged her close to him
